name: map
signature: { <A, B>(f: (a: A) => B): <E>(self: Exit<A, E>) => Exit<B, E>; <A, E, B>(self: Exit<A, E>, f: (a: A) => B): Exit<B, E>; }
description:
Maps over the `Success` value of the specified exit using the provided
function.
documentation:
Maps over the `Success` value of the specified exit using the provided
function.
